name: Shift Runner (LoneWolfCoder)
description:
Shift Runner is an android mobile game, developed using the Unity game engine, and is available to Download now on the Play Store. 

This was a little project/game I developed in a few days to test out Unity's game engine.

Goal of the Game

As an endless runner type game, the goal is for the player to survive as long possible, avoiding the obstacles that continuously spawn. To do this, the player has the ability to shift between two dimensions.
